-e ---

𐀹 #wi•der! videor 𓂧 𓁷 𓂋 𓄛

𐀹 F in 𐀹𐀪𐀜 wi-ri-no Fρινός 𓆓 𓎛 𓂋 𓄛 qvhrino leather

𐀹-𐀆 wi-de videor he saw δέρκομαι dérkomai देखना dekhnā
𐀹-𐀪-𐀚-𐀃 wi-ri-ne-o 𐀹-𐀪 DER 𐀪 (from) leather
𐀹-𐀪-𐀛-𐀍 wi-ri-ni-jo von Rinder? ῥινός •made of leather ⇔
𐀹-𐀪-𐀜 wi-ri-no skin of man and animal, cow hides •ox-hides ⇔ ῥινός
𐀹-𐀪-𐀼 wi-ri-za ῥιζα iris root / straining wool
𐀹-𐀴-𐀖-𐀊 wi-ti-mi-ja ceremony of the isthmus in corinth! ( …time?)
